channel.title: Adding a timer
channel.description: A lot of people complain when the Auto Restarter does it's job. I was wondering if I could add a 5 minute timer on the screen to warn people of the next restart. Is this possible to add? Thanks.

item.title: Adding a timer
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

It’s server side.
sendQuest(“Time left: “+minTimer+”:”+secTimer, int);
That’s for showing it, obviously, so I don’t know the int for the line number.
So you would declare a timer for minutes, and a time for seconds, then you would go on from there. Easy enough?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a timer
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

hmm that would be cool…I’m not sure how to do it because most auto-restarts are not illiterate, as in you can not go inside, and code them. well at least i don’t know how to do that =p =\ would be cool though and if someone knows can you help? it would be a cool update to the community =D

Read full topic
